Cerberus.allies: You are required to cooperate with other Cerberus agents to accomplish your tasks. Cooperation with other organizations is allowed if it contributes to the fulfillment of the objectives.
Cerberus.goal: Humanity is shackled in a circle of enemies. You are the hope for a better future!
Cerberus.introduction: You are an agent of Cerberus!
Cerberus.uplink: Cerberus has provided you with the basic means of protection and communication.
